parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: Optional. Field name to sort by. See below for valid sort fields.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Optional. Valid values: `asc`: Ascending, sort low-to-high / A-to-Z. nulls appear first. `desc`: Descending, sort high-to low / Z-to-A nulls appear last.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Optional. The page number of the result set to be returned.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Optional. The number of results to be returned. Defaulted to 200 if value is not provided.

parameters.name: lite
parameters.description: Optional. When set to true only a small subset of fields will be returned in the response.

ShippingSameAsBilling.description: Required.  Set to `true` to indicate that there is no separate shipping address, even if you are not including a billing address. Set to `false` to require `ShippingAddress` fields.

StreetAddress1.description: Required if `BillingAddress` is included.  250 characters max

City.description: Required if `BillingAddress` is included.  100 characters max.

StateCode.description: Optional. Valid 2 character State or Territory code in the US or Canada.

ZipCode.description: Required if `BillingAddress` is included.  10 characters max

Country.description: Optional. Valid 2 character country code.  Defaults to "US".

BillingAddress.description: Billing address is not required, but if included all its attributes are required except `StreetAddress2`, `StateCode`,‚Äù and `Country`. From 5 to 10 characters of any type is valid for `ZipCode`.

StreetAddress1.description: Required if `ShippingAddress` is included.  250 characters max.

StateCode.description: Optional. Valid 2 character State or Territory code in the US or Canada.

City.description: Required if `ShippingAddress` is included. 100 characters max.

ZipCode.description: Required if `ShippingAddress` is included.  10 characters max.

Country.description: Optional. Valid 2 character country code.  Defaults to "US".

ShippingAddress.description: Not required if `ShippingSameAsBilling` is set to `true`, but if included all its attributes are required except `StreetAddress2`, `StateCode`, and `Country`. From 5 to 10 characters of any type is valid for `ZipCode`.

CustomerAccount.description: Optional. 28 characters max. Useful for assigning non-PaySimple Id to the customer for future reference.

Phone.description: Optional.10 characters max, enter as a numeric string; do not include parenthesis or dashes.

AltPhone.description: Optional.10 characters max, enter as a numeric string; do not include parenthesis or dashes.

MobilePhone.description: Optional.10 characters max, enter as a numeric string; do not include parenthesis or dashes.

Fax.description: Optional.10 characters max, enter as a numeric string; do not include parenthesis or dashes.

Email.description: Optional. 100 characters max, must be a valid email address.

AltEmail.description: Optional. 100 characters max, must be a valid email address.

Website.description: Optional. 100 characters max, must be in URL format.

Notes.description: Optional. 2048 characters max. Open text field.

Message.example: ShippingAddress is required when ShippingSameAsBilling is false

put.description: Updates the customer object for the customer specified in the request body.

Id.description: Required.  Customer Id of the customer you would like to update.

ShippingSameAsBilling.description: Required. Set to `true` to indicate that there is no separate shipping address, even if you are not including a billing address. Set to `false` to require `ShippingAddress` fields.

StreetAddress1.description: Required if `ShippingAddress` is included. 250 characters max.

City.description: Required if `BillingAddress` is included. 100 characters max.

StateCode.description: Optional. Valid 2 character State or Territory code in the US or Canada

ZipCode.description: Required if `ShippingAddress` is included. 10 characters max.

Country.description: Optional. Valid 2 character country code. Defaults to "US".

BillingAddress.description: Billing address is not required, but if included all its attributes are required except `StreetAddress2`, `StateCode`, and `Country`. From 5 to 10 characters of any type is valid for `ZipCode`.

StreetAddress1.description: Required if `ShippingAddress` is included. 250 characters max.

City.description: Required if `ShippingAddress` is included. 100 characters max.

StateCode.description: Optional. Valid 2 character State or Territory code in the US or Canada.

ZipCode.description: Required if `ShippingAddress` is included. 10 characters max.

Country.description: Optional. Valid 2 character country code. Defaults to "US".

ShippingAddress.description: Not required if `ShippingSameAsBilling` is set to `true`, but if included all its attributes are required except `StreetAddress2`, `StateCode`, and `Country`. From 5 to 10 characters of any type is valid for `ZipCode`.

CustomerAccount.description: Optional. 28 characters max. Useful for assigning non-PaySimple Id to the customer for future reference.

Phone.description: Optional.10 characters max, enter as a numeric string; do not include parenthesis or dashes.

AltPhone.description: Optional. 10 characters max, enter as a numeric string; do not include parenthesis or dashes.

MobilePhone.description: Optional. 10 characters max, enter as a numeric string; do not include parenthesis or dashes.

Fax.description: Optional. 10 characters max, enter as a numeric string; do not include parenthesis or dashes.

Email.description: Optional. 100 characters max, must be a valid email address.

AltEmail.description: Optional. 100 characters max, must be a valid email address.

Website.description: Optional. 100 characters max, must be in URL format.

Notes.description: Optional. 2048 characters max. Open text field.

Message.example: The FirstName field is required.

post.description: Creates a new Credit Card Account object for the specified customer.

CustomerId.description: Required. The unique identifier of the Customer to add the new card.

ExpirationDate.description: Required. A valid date in the format of mm/yyyy

IsDefault.description: Optional. `true` sets the card as the default Credit Card Account for the Customer.  If there are no other cards attached to the Customer, the new card will be set as default.

BillingZipCode.description: Optional.  Max 10 characters. If not provided, the Billing Zip Code of the Customer will be used when processing a payment.

Success.value:
{
    "CreditCardNumber": "************1111",
    "ExpirationDate": "12/2033",
    "Issuer": "Visa",
    "BillingZipCode": "80202",
    "CustomerId": 9695143,
    "IsDefault": true,
    "RequiresValidation": false,
    "Id": 8989970,  // Unique Id of the Account
    "LastModified": "2018-01-11T23:04:58.8330513Z",
    "CreatedOn": "2018-01-10T20:29:03Z"
}

Message.example: Customer id 8989970 does not exist

put.description: Updates the `ExpirationDate` and/or `BillingZipCode` on the credit card for the account specified in the request body.

CustomerId.description: Required. The id of the customer which the card is being updated. Cannot be modified.

CreditCardNumber.description: Required. 15, 16 digits or 19 digits. Cannot be modified.  `"****************"` can also be entered to pass validation.

ExpirationDate.description: Required. A valid date in the format of mm/yyyy. Can be modified.

AccountId.description: Required. Id of the specified credit card account to be updated.

BillingZipCode.description: Optional. `true` sets the card as the default Credit Card Account for the Customer.  If there are no other cards attached to the Customer, the new card will be set as default.  Can be modified.

get.description: Returns a list of all ACH (bank) accounts associated with a specified customer.

parameters.name: CustomerId
parameters.description: Id of specific customer to retrieve a list of ACH accounts

Message.example: Customer with ID 0 does not exist

get.description: Returns a list of payment records for the specified customer.

parameters.name: CustomerId
parameters.description: Id of specific customer to retrieve list of payment records

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: Optional. Valid values: `returndate`,`estimatedsettledate`,`actualsettleddate`,`paymentdate`,`paymenttype`,`paymentsubtype`,`amount`

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Optional. Valid values: `asc`: Ascending, sort low-to-high / A-to-Z. nulls appear first. `desc`: Descending, sort high-to low / Z-to-A nulls appear last.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Optional. The page number of the result set to be returned.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Optional. The number of results to be returned.

parameters.name: startdate
parameters.description: Optional.  Earliest payment creation date to retrieve. Format: yyyy-mm-dd.

parameters.name: enddate
parameters.description: Optional.  Last payment creation date to retrieve. Format: yyyy-mm-dd.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional. Valid values: `authorized`,`chargeback`,`failed`,`pending`,`posted`,`refundsettled`,`returned`,`reversed`,`reversensf`,`reverseposted`,`settled`,`voided`. See [Payment Status Reference](ref:payment-statuses).

get.description: Filterable and sortable list of all payment records.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: Optional. Valid values: `returndate`,`estimatedsettledate`,`actualsettleddate`,`paymentdate`,`paymenttype`,`paymentsubtype`,`amount`

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Optional. Valid values: `asc`: Ascending, sort low-to-high / A-to-Z. nulls appear first. `desc`: Descending, sort high-to low / Z-to-A nulls appear last.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Optional. The page number of the result set to be returned.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Optional. The number of results to be returned.

parameters.name: startdate
parameters.description: Optional.  Set to filter payments created on or after the given date. Format: yyyy-mm-dd.

parameters.name: enddate
parameters.description: Optional.  Set to filter payments created on or before the given date. Format: yyyy-mm-dd.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional.  Valid values: `authorized`,`chargeback`,`failed`,`pending`,`posted`,`refundsettled`,`returned`,`reversed`,`reversensf`,`reverseposted`,`settled`,`voided`.  Accepts comma-separated list for multiple values. See [Payment Status Reference](ref:payment-statuses). Default: all status values.

parameters.name: lite
parameters.description: Optional. When true, returns a smaller payload with fewer fields.

post.description: Collect a payment for the specified `AccountId`.

AccountId.description: Required.  The system identifier for the credit card Account or ACH account used for the payment. This is the `Id` attribute from the credit card object or ACH account object created in the previous step.

Amount.description: Required. The amount to charge. Enter a number only, do not include the $. You can enter an integer or a decimal. If you use more than 2 decimal places, the system will round to the nearest penny-- i.e. entering 3.129 will result in a payment amount of 3.13.  Cannot exceed 2,000,000.00

CVV.description: Optional.  Credit card security code. Should be 4 characters for American Express or 3 characters for any other card type.

PaymentSubType.description: Optional.  This field defaults to `Moto` for credit card payments and `Web` for ACH payments if not included or left null.  CC Valid Values: `Swipe`, `Moto`.  ACH Valid Values: `Web`, `Tel`, `Ppd`, `Ccd`.

InvoiceId.description: Optional.  This is a system invoice identifier. If included it will seat the associated system invoice number in the InvoiceNumber attribute, and will apply the payment to the specified Invoice Id. NOTE: Invoice creation and management is not currently available via the API.

InvoiceNumber.description: Optional.  This has a 50 characters max; the invoice number attached to the payment. If the number provided is a system invoice number, the associated InvoiceId will be attached to the payment and the payment will be applied to the system invoice. NOTE: Invoice creation and management is not currently available via the API.

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: Optional.  50 characters max. The purchase order number attached to the payment.

OrderId.description: Optional.  This has a 50 characters max; a back-end transaction identifier not included in the UI.

Description.description: Optional.  This has a 2048 characters max.

Latitude.description: Optional.  This field is not currently used in the UI, but will accept and save latitude values.

Longitude.description: Optional.  This field is not currently used in the UI, but will accept and save longitude values.

PaymentToken.description: Optional. One time use token returned in PaySimpleJS.

CardOnFileType.description: Required for all COF transactions.  How the payment was collected. Options: `None`, `MerchantInitiated`, `CustomerInitiated`, `Recurring`, `Installment.`

NetworkTransactionId.description: Conditional (required for Card on File transaction and requires CardOnFileType other than 'None').  Value provided by the card network to identify a specific card on file used in transactions of the same sale type. The response to the first successful transaction with a card on file will contain a Network Transaction Id. This id must be retained from the initial successful authorization and is required to be submitted with each subsequent sale or resubmission for a card on file.

IsResubmission.description: Conditional (requires CardOnFileType).  Set to true if the request is a resubmission of a previously failed authorization.

Message.example: Before you can delete this customer, you must cancel all open recurring payments, payment plans, billing schedules, appointments, future payments and invoices associated with this record.

post.description: Creates a new ACH Account object for the specified customer.

CustomerId.description: Required. Customer Id that the new ACH will be created for.   The Id for the Customer Record to which the ACH is being added. This is the `Id` property from a previously created Customer.

RoutingNumber.description: Required. Account routing number of ACH account to be created. 9 digit bank routing number.

AccountNumber.description: Required. Account number of ACH account to be created. Min 2 digits, max 50 digits.

BankName.description: Required. Name of bank of ACH account to be created. 100 characters max.

IsCheckingAccount.description: If type of bank account is Checking set to `true`, if Savings set to `false`.

IsDefault.description: Required. Determines if new ACH account will be the default account; enter `true` to set the account as the default ACH Account for the Customer Record, otherwise enter `false`. If there are no other ACH Accounts attached to the Customer, the field will default to `true` regardless of your entry.

Message.example: Routing Number must be 9 digits

put.description: Updates the `IsCheckingAccount`on the ACH Account object for the account specified in the request body.

Id.description: Required. The Id of the ACH account to be modified.

IsCheckingAccount.description: Required. Verifies if checking true, if savings false, of ACH account to be created.

RoutingNumber.description: Required. The Routing Number of the Account. Cannot be modified.

AccountNumber.description: Required. Account number of ACH account; min 4 digits, max 100 digits. Cannot be modified.

Bank Name.description: Required. Name of bank of ACH account. Cannot be modified.

post.description: Collect payments on scheduled dates for the specified `AccountId`.

AccountId.description: The system identifier for the credit card Account or ACH account used for the payment. This is the Id attribute from the credit card object or ACH account object created previously.

PaymentAmount.description: Amount of the payment to be charged on specified schedule.

StartDate.description: Date to start the schedule. Must not be in the past.  If the schedule is not scheduled to run on this date, will bill on the first scheduled day.

ExecutionFrequencyType.description: Frequency to run the schedule. Valid values: `Daily`, `Weekly`, `BiWeekly`, `FirstofMonth`, `SpecificDayofMonth`, `LastofMonth`, `Quarterly`, `SemiAnnually`, `Annually`

ExecutionFrequencyParameter.description: Required if `ExecutionFrequencyType` is `Weekly` or `SpecificDayofMonth`.  If `Weekly` specifies day of week (1=Sunday; 2=Monday; 3=Tuesday; 4=Wednesday; 5=Thursday).  If `SpecificDayofMonth`, refers to day of month.  If day of the month does not exist for a given month (e.g. 30 in February), the schedule will fire on the last day of the month.  However, `LastofMonth` is suggested for this use case to avoid confusion.

EndDate.description: The date the schedule is to stop generating payments. If not included, the schedule will default to running until manually disabled.

PaymentSubType.description: This field defaults to `Moto` for credit card payments and Web for ACH payments if not included or left null. CC Valid Values: `Moto`. ACH Valid Values: `Web`, `Tel`, `Ppd`, `Ccd`.

InvoiceNumber.description: The invoice number attached to the payment. If the number provided is a invoice number of an existing PaySimple invoice, the associated `InvoiceId` will be attached to the payment and the payment will be applied to the invoice.  Max 50 characters. NOTE: Invoice creation and management is not currently available via the API.

FirstPaymentAmount.description: Custom payment amount that is executed prior to the start of the schedule. Enter a number only, do not include the $. You can enter an integer or a decimal. If you use more than 2 decimal places, the system will round to the nearest penny-- i.e. entering 23.129 will result in a FirstPaymentAmount of 23.13.

FirstPaymentDate.description: The date the custom first payment is to be processed. This can be the current date, or any future date, but must be prior to the schedule StartDate. If a future date is used, it can be edited prior to the custom first payment being generated. After the custom first payment is actually generated the field becomes read-only. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.

Result.value:
{
        "CustomerId": 8317963,
        "CustomerFirstName": "John",
        "CustomerLastName": "Doe",
        "CustomerCompany": "Great Plumbing",
        "NextScheduleDate": "2018-08-01T06:00:00Z",
        "PauseUntilDate": null,
        "FirstPaymentDone": false,
        "DateOfLastPaymentMade": null,
        "TotalAmountPaid": 0,
        "NumberOfPaymentsMade": 0,
        "EndDate": null,
        "PaymentAmount": 12,
        "PaymentSubType": "Moto",
        "AccountId": 7592056,
        "InvoiceNumber": null,
        "OrderId": null,
        "FirstPaymentAmount": 0,
        "FirstPaymentDate": null,
        "StartDate": "2018-07-03T21:57:27.782Z",
        "ScheduleStatus": "Active",
        "ExecutionFrequencyType": "FirstofMonth",
        "ExecutionFrequencyParameter": 1,
        "Description": null,
        "Id": 1459382,
        "LastModified": "2018-06-26T21:57:27.9153135Z",
        "CreatedOn": "2018-06-26T21:57:27.9153135Z"
    }

Message.example: Start date can't be in the past.

Id.description: The `ScheduleId` of the Recurring Payment to be modified.

PaymentAmount.description: Amount of the payment to be charged on the scheduled time.

AccountId.description: Id for the Credit Card Account or ACH Account used for the schedule. Any `AccountId` associated with the Customer is valid. If account associated changes the payment method of the schedule Credit Card to ACH, or vice versa, and do not specify a new PaymentSubType the system will update the schedule with the default sub-type for the account type (`Moto` for CC and ACH `Web` for ACH).

StartDate.description: The date the schedule is configured to start running. If this date is in the future you can change it to the current date or any other future date. If this date has passed, then this field is read-only and cannot be changed. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.

ExecutionFrequencyType.description: Frequency to run the schedule. Valid values: `Daily`, `Weekly`, `BiWeekly`, `FirstofMonth`, `SpecificDayofMonth`, `LastofMonth`, `Quarterly`, `SemiAnnually`, `Annually`

ExecutionFrequencyParameter.description: Required if ExecutionFrequencyType is Weekly or SpecificDayofMonth. If Weekly specifies day of week (1=Sunday; 2=Monday; 3=Tuesday; 4=Wednesday; 5=Thursday). If SpecificDayofMonth, refers to day of month. If day of the month does not exist for a given month (e.g. 30 in February), the schedule will fire on the last day of the month. However, LastofMonth is suggested for this use case to avoid confusion.

EndDate.description: The date the schedule is to stop generating payments. You can change this date to any other future date, or set it to ‚Äúnull‚Äù to run the schedule indefinitely. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.

InvoiceNumber.description: The Invoice Number attached to the schedule. 50 characters max.

FirstPaymentAmount.description: Custom payment amount that is executed prior to the start of the schedule. You can only change this amount if the `FirstPaymentDate` is in the future. Once the payment has been generated this field becomes read-only.

FirstPaymentDate.description: Date the custom first payment is to be processed. You can only change this if the existing date is in the future, and you can change it to the current date or any other future date. Once the payment has been generated this field becomes read-only. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.

PaymentSubType.description: Defaults to `Moto` for credit card payments and `Web` for ACH payments if not included or left null. You can manually enter a new value for this field or omit it (or set it to null) and let the system assign the default sub-type for the `AccountId`.

Result.value:
{
  "CustomerId": 8053900,
  "CustomerFirstName": "John",
  "CustomerLastName": "Doe",
  "CustomerCompany": "Great Plumbing",
  "NextScheduleDate": "2018-07-31T06:00:00Z",
  "PauseUntilDate": null,
  "FirstPaymentDone": false,
  "DateOfLastPaymentMade": null,
  "TotalAmountPaid": 0,

}

put.description: Resume a paused or suspended schedule.

parameters.name: ScheduleId
parameters.description: Id of the specified paused or suspended recurring payment to be resumed.

Message.example: Specified schedule does not exist

put.description: Stop a recurring payment from generating payments until resumed.

parameters.name: ScheduleId
parameters.description: Id of the specified recurring payment to be suspended.

Message.example: Specified schedule does not exist

get.description: Get enabled credit card and payment types for merchant
